attributes.action: legislate that the MINIMUM wage rise, in both the public and private sectors, is inflation rate (according to the index which takes housing costs into account) PLUS .5 or 1%.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I acknowledge that this IS similar to a previous petition but it is NOT identical.  The petition referred to asked only for wage rises to be the same as inflation, which would effectively mean a wage freeze, whereas mine would mean a wage RISE in real terms.  This should also apply to the minimum wage (the existence of which of course provides a precedent for state control of wages).
